meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jack McClintock Andrea Bornschlegel Jason Keller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6276.

td.p: Jack McClintock, a graduate student of aerospace engineering from Westford, Vermont
Andrea Bornschlegel, a corporate controller from Mountain View, California
Jason Keller, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey (whose 6-day cash winnings total $147,000)

tr.td: FUNDRAISERS
FAMOUS TOMBS
ALSO A BODY PART
FOREIGN WORDS & PHRASES
SOUP ALPHABET
SCIENCE TERMS
